description:
The world remains captivated by "Let It Go," the Oscar-winning piano ballad from Disney's animated smash, Frozen. But what's missing? Ahh, yes, sex scenes and fire-breathing dragons. Enter "Let It Go(T)," a YouTube mash-up which pairs that track's musical backing with images from (and new lyrics inspired by) the HBO fantasy series Game of Thrones. 奥斯卡获奖钢琴民谣、迪士尼动画片《冰雪奇缘》的主题曲《Let It Go》仍然令世界人民如痴如醉。但我们错过了什么？哈哈对了，激情画面和火龙！在YouTube上最近疯传的一个视频Let It Go(T)中，播放的歌曲音乐采用《Let It Go》的旋律、背景画面采用HBO热播剧《权力的游戏》里的情节（甚至还配了新版歌词）。

【相关阅读】《Let It Go》25种语言版现场录制MV发布>>>

Dubbed Let It Go(T), it was co-written and performed by Gail Folsom with Joanna Robinson and Dave Gonzales, with editing by David Chen.本视频被命名为Let It Go(T)，它是由盖尔·福尔瑟姆、乔安娜·罗宾逊和戴夫·冈萨雷斯联合创作的，由大卫·陈剪辑制作。

The song declares that ‘John Snow never bothered me anyway’ while lamenting the troubles of trying to stream the programme online.歌中唱道：“反正琼恩·雪诺从不会干扰到我”，同时还吐槽了HBO网加载视频速度很慢。

It also mentions the not-so-subtle recasting of Daario Naharis and that the kids on the show are growing up fast – unlike Daenerys’ dragons.另外歌词里也提到达里奥·纳哈里斯的扮演者被悄悄替换了；剧集里的孩子长得太快，而丹妮莉丝的火龙长得却很慢。

A sample of the lyrics are below and give you a sense of “Let it Go(T)”:看看下面的歌词吧，感受一下Let it Go(T)：

Snow blows white on the wall tonight
Not a walker to be seen
Winter’s been coming for seasons
So why is it still green?

In every episode, a new bearded guy
Couldn’t keep them straight, heaven knows I’ve tried
How many seasons can there be
’til Sansa’s turning thirty-three?

Two more books, but much more show
and three-eyed crows

Game of Thrones, Game of Thrones
Who’s the hero on this show?
Tyrion?
That new guy?
Even book readers don’t know!

I don’t care what your spoilers say
Let the show rage on
Jon Snow never bothered me anyway

【相关阅读】诚实预告片：《权力的游戏》神吐槽>>>

title: 神翻唱："权力的游戏"版"Let It Go"
